#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int i , n, j, k, B[100000];
    string s;
    scanf("%lld", &n);

    while(n--) {
        scanf("%lld", &j);
        cin >> s;
        for(i = 0; i < j; i++) {
            scanf("%lld", &B[i]);
        }
        //scanf("%lld", &m);
        for(i = 0; i < j; i++) {
            k = s[i];
            s[i] = s[B[i]-1];
            s[B[i]-1] = k;
           // cout << s[i] << endl;
        }
        cout << s << endl;
    }
    /*int n, i, j, k;
    char c;
    system("echo hello");
    return 0;*/
}
